result.arabic_text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
result.translation: (41) Or do they have partners?[1731] Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.
result.footnotes: [1731]- i.e., those to whom they attribute divinity other than Allāh or partners from among themselves.
